greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of primitive (aperiodic) palindromes using a maximum of two different symbols.
reference: M. R. Nester (1999). Mathematical investigations of some plant interaction designs. PhD Thesis. University of Queensland, Brisbane, Australia. [See A056391 for pdf file of Chap. 2]
program: (PARI) a(n) = sumdiv(n, d, moebius(d)*2^((1 + n/d)\2)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Apr 24 2020
results.author: _Marks R. Nester_
